config.customcobblemonmusicmod.title: Custom Cobblemon Music Mod
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.strong_ba: Volume for strong battle music when facing higher level Pokemon (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.panic_vol: Volume for panic music when Pokemon health is low (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.victory_v: Volume for victory music after winning battles (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.evolution: Volume for evolution music during Pokemon evolution (0.0 - 1.0)
Volume for congratulations music after evolution completes (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.catch_con: Volume for congratulations music when catching Pokemon (0.0 - 1.0)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.enable_st: Enable special music for battles against higher level Pokemon
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.enable_pa: Enable panic music when Pokemon health is low
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.enable_vi: Enable victory music after winning battles
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.enable_ca: Enable congratulations music when catching Pokemon
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.panic_hea: Health percentage threshold to trigger panic music (0.0 - 1.0, default: 0.2 = 20%)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.strong_ba: Level difference required to trigger strong battle music (default: 15 levels)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.victory_m: How long victory music plays in milliseconds (default: 7000 = 7 seconds)
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.immediate: Stop music immediately when battle ends instead of fading out
config.customcobblemonmusicmod.debug_log: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting (check console logs)
